user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfortable and reliable clothing for home wear and for my family, ensuring quality and affordability.
purchase_reason: I was looking for something comfortable to wear at home, and the lightweight cotton and elastic waistband promised a cozy experience. The classic design appealed to my desire for simplicity and reliability in loungewear.

I wanted to find affordable clothing that was comfortable and of good quality for my family. The positive feedback from others about the fit and comfort influenced my decision, as I wanted to ensure satisfaction for my husband.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer exceptional comfort, quality materials, and a good fit. I value items that are designed for everyday use, providing both style and functionality, such as breathable fabrics and supportive features. I appreciate when products maintain their quality over time, like retaining color and shape after multiple uses. Additionally, I enjoy items that are versatile enough for various occasions, whether casual or slightly dressy. On the other hand, I tend to dislike products that are poorly constructed, lack comfort, or do not meet my expectations in terms of fit and durability.

Item No.1 : Item Title: <Dreamcrest Women’s Snap-Front House Coat Flannel Duster Robe with Pockets> / Item ID: B08L5MKTSR / Price: $19.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Sleep & Lounge'] / Description: ['MAKE LOUNGING IN THE HOUSE AN ULTRA-COMFY AFFAIR', 'Stay Warm', 'Whether you’re reading the morning paper or sitting down for breakfast, slipping into your nightgown or looking to stay warm after your shower, the Just Love women’s housecoat treats you to the toasty comfort you crave! You’ll love the softness, warmth, and breathability of the 100% cotton flannel fabric. And thanks to the snaps at the front, slipping your flannel duster over your nightgown or PJs will be a breeze. Go ahead, stay warm and comfy without compromising your freedom of movement.', 'Beautiful Style', 'This is more than just a house coat; it’s an opportunity to flaunt your style and a chance to brighten up your mood. You’re sure to find something you’ll love from our collection of prints. We have it all: everything from fun animal prints, classic plaid patterns, good ol’ argyle, to festive holiday prints. For that timeless housecoat look, we’ve designed the duster robes with a classic quilted collar and a trapunto neckline.', 'Here are more reasons to love this housecoat:', '?Has 2 large patch pockets for warmth or carrying essentials.', '?Matching snaps blend into the garment to create a lovely look.', '?Long and roomy for a touch of modesty and unrestricted movement.', '?Retains its softness and look even after multiple washes.', '?Available in S-3X to fit all shapes and sizes.', 'Get your classic flannel duster and experience amazing lounging comfort!'] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <HomeIdeas mens Comfortable> / Item ID: B09MNNTS6W / Price: $23.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Shoes', 'Slippers'] / Description: ['Merrimac Memory Foam Slippers - Only Committed to Endless Comfort of Our Daily Life!', 'We can provide for you：', '·Simple but Practical Design·Soft & Comfy Fit·Quality Guarantee', 'Care Instructions:', "·The product is both hand and machine washable. ·A water temperature of 30 degree centigrade is recommended to achieve the best result. ·Air dry and flat dry. ·Don't bleach. The chemicals in breach seriously damage fabric.", 'Please Note:', 'As you receive these slippers, they are brand new, due to the high-density material, you may feel a bit snug at first. Give them some time and then they will contour to your feet as you wear them. Then, you may get a much better fit.', 'Measurement:', '*Size Small / 7-8 D (M) US = 9 1/2" (24 -24.5cm) *Size Medium / 9-10 D (M) US = 10 1/4" (25.5 - 26cm) *Size Large / 11-12 D (M) US = 11" (26.5 – 27.5cm) *Size X-Large / 13-14 D (M) US = 11 1/2" (28 – 29cm)', "Treat your feet with sweet gentle and grab a pair today! - RISK FREE - Click 'Add to Cart' above to get yours now!"] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <PAVILIA Womens Fleece Housecoat Zipper Robe, Plush Warm Zip Up Front Lounger> / Item ID: B0BHMS3SB9 / Price: $27.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Sleep & Lounge'] / Description: ['PAVILIA Fleece House Coat Women, Zip Up Robe Lounger, Gray Full Length Zipper Robe Duster Long Bathrobe with Satin Trim and Pockets ZIP UP FLEECE ROBE: Designed to be comfortable and soft. Our fleece front zip robe is perfect for lounging and relaxing at home. Plush, warm, cozy, snug, makes it great for leisure, after shower, maternity, morning, and evening routines.', 'SOFT, COMFY HOUSE COAT - Our microfiber fleece zip-front long robe is full length, with a soft collar, and long sleeves. Designed with a luxurious satin trim and waffle cuff accent. Relaxed and loose fit, allows you to move freely while the zipper makes changing and wearing easy.', 'HIGH QUALITY AND DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: Available in 7 colors Made with 260 GSM of 100% premium microfiber polyester, this zip up robe is soft, lightweight, yet durable.', 'EASY TO CARE: Wash separately in cold water, tumble dry low.', 'AVAILABLE IN 2 SIZES: Small/Medium (US 6-10) | Overall Length: 47.2 in | Shoulder: 19.6 in | Sleeve Length: 23.6 in | Cuff: 6.4 in || Large/X-Large (US 12-16) | Overall Length: 47.2 in | Shoulder: 26.3 in | Sleeve Length: 24.8 in | Cuff: 6.6 in | Please measure before buying for perfect fit! Pavilia is the Comfort You Can Trust.  Our Vision', 'To provide premium home goods that improves and enriches the life of everyone. We will continue to innovate and bring exciting products to market so you can enjoy life more! Our Products  At Pavilia, we offer an extensive line of throws and blankets that are made of premium fabrics for different use cases. Our blankets comes in different patterns, trims, and colors, making them the perfect choices for mixing and matching, and complementing your home. \xa0Furthermore, we incorporated practical designs into our blankets such as arm sleeves so you can take the joy of lying around your couch to the next level!']
